com.jalios.util

Interface JPropertiesListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessControlManager, AlertManager, AnalyticsManager, Channel, ComparatorManager, ContentSecurityPolicyManager, DBEventLogManager, FileProcessorManager, HierarchicalWorkspacesManager, IncomingMailListener, MailFetcher, MentionManager, PublicationFollowerManager, QuotaManager, ReaderTrackerManager, RecommendationManager, ResourceHelper, StatManager, VoteManager, WeakLockManager, WysiwygManager

    public interface JPropertiesListener
    Interface to implement to be notified of JCMS property modification.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String REVISION 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void propertiesChange(JProperties properties)
      Invoked after properties have been modified in JCMS and save on disk.

    • Field Detail

      • REVISION

        static final java.lang.String REVISION
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • propertiesChange

        void propertiesChange(JProperties properties)
        Invoked after properties have been modified in JCMS and save on disk.

        You cannot alter the value received in parameters.

        Parameters:
        properties - the properties which have been modified (may not contain all JCMS properties)
